readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.6/f Maru 500/p Maru: breezy/20 19/farmer 9 20 1 Maru 22 20 1 Demetrius 19 18 0 Robin 13 6 0 Sebastian -100 -100 2/skippable/move farmer 7 0 1/faceDirection Maru 3/faceDirection Demetrius 3/speak Maru "啊，你好！"/move farmer 1 0 1/speak Maru "我和我爸正对土壤样本进行测试呢。"/pause 800/emote farmer 40/speak Maru "不要害羞嘛！我们正缺人手呢。$h"/move farmer 4 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 2/speak Maru "能帮我看一下这个烧杯吗？我去取最后一批样本。#$b#我去去就回。"/pause 400/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 1 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 0/speed Maru 4/move Maru -16 0 3/speed Maru 4/move Maru 0 3 2/move Maru 0 1 2/warp Maru -100 -100/playSound doorClose/faceDirection Demetrius 2/speak Demetrius "多谢你帮忙，@。"/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 0/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/speak Demetrius "玛鲁是个乖孩子。她可是我的小乖乖……"/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 2/stopMusic/pause 800/speak Demetrius "我可不想有什么东西妨碍她光明的未来，你懂我的意思吧？$5"/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Demetrius 0/speak Demetrius "平时多想想这事吧……*轻笑*$h"/playSound doorClose/warp Maru 6 24/playMusic kindadumbautumn/move Maru 0 -4 1/emote farmer 40 true/move Maru 3 0 1/faceDirection farmer 1 true/move Maru 8 0 1/speak Maru "啊，真是抱歉了。在我不在的时候你们有话题聊吧？"/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Demetrius 3/pause 500/speak Demetrius "……我刚刚在和@说我们测试的土壤样本的事。"/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 2/speak Demetrius "$q 15933 null#我说的没错吧，@?#$r 15933 10 Event_Lab_Silence#（什么也不说）#$r 15933 -100 Event_Lab_Rat#其实，你爸刚刚可神秘了。"/fork DadWeird/pause 500/speak Maru "好的！那么，@……我来告诉你如何使用仪器。"/move Maru 4 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 2/move Maru 0 1 1/move Maru 1 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/end Maru1
content.DadWeird: speak Maru "哈？爸，你跟他说什么了？$a^哈？爸，你跟她说什么了？$a"/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 2/emote Demetrius 28/speak Demetrius "好啦，好啦……我们在说你啊，小宝贝。$5#$b#我想和@说说你的事……但是又怕你难为情……我不该对你说谎的。$s"/faceDirection Demetrius 0/pause 300/emote Maru 28/move Maru 2 0 0/speak Maru "没事的，爸爸。我们能理解的。#$b#趁样本还没结晶我们最好赶紧回去工作。"/faceDirection Demetrius 2/emote Demetrius 32/move Maru 3 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 0/faceDirection farmer 1/end Maru1

2/pause 200/move Maru 0 1 1/move Maru 2 0 2/move Maru 0 2 2/doAction 7 10/speak Maru "@，嗨！请进。"/move Maru 0 -2 3/move Maru -2 0 0/move Maru 0 -1 1/move farmer 0 -5 3/speak Maru "我在搞一个新项目……是很了不起的东西哦。"/pause 1000/speak Maru "这只是其中一种成分……我给你演示一下。"/pause 500/speak Maru "把你的手放在这里……"/pause 300/animate farmer true true 100 35/pause 800/speak Maru "然后打开开关……"/stopMusic/pause Event_Cut2#抱歉就对了。简直疼死人了！"/faceDirection Maru 2/showFrame Maru 26/pause 800/speak Maru "气氛一下就毁了，是吧？*唉*$s"/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 500/move Maru -1 0 3/move farmer 0 1 3/pause 500/emote farmer content.25/f Demetrius 1500/p Demetrius/p Robin: jaunty/-1000 -1000/farmer -10 -10 0 Demetrius 6 21 3 Robin 5 21 1/skippable/showFrame Demetrius 28/viewport 6 21 true/pause 900/speak Robin "德米特里厄斯，我跟你说的是拿水果来。不是拿西红柿来。"/emote Demetrius 8/speak Demetrius "真是搞不懂。西红柿就是水果啊！"/emote Robin 12/speak Robin "只要是正常人，说想要水果的时候，要的都绝对不会是西红柿的。这与西红柿在科学上的分类无关。"/warp farmer 6 24/playSound doorClose/pause 500/showFrame Demetrius 29/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Demetrius "@！你来的正好。你帮我们解决这个争端最合适不过了。"/move farmer 0 -2 0/emote farmer 8/speak Demetrius "$q 59 null#你觉得西红柿算什么？#$r 59 -30 Event_tomato1#蔬菜#$r 59 50 Event_tomato2#水果"/pause 500/showFrame Demetrius 28/speak Demetrius "我只想告诉你我的观点。#$b#每次你跟我说些什么的时候，我都感觉很难做出推断呢。"/pause 300/faceDirection Robin 1/pause 300/speak Demetrius "但我会尽力的。"/pause 600/emote Robin 20/pause 300/showFrame Demetrius 29/pause 600/speak Demetrius "谢谢你的帮助，@。$h"/pause 800/end
content.33/f Robin 1500/p Robin: jaunty/5 17/farmer 6 24 0 Robin 5 17 3/skippable/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 200/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "嗨，@。我正给锯子清灰呢。"/pause 400/faceDirection Robin 3/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "$q 66 null#你有没有用木头做过东西呢，@？#$r 66 50 event_wood1#有#$r 66 50 event_wood2#没有"/pause 500/speak Robin "我觉得凭咱俩的关系，已经可以把我木匠的诀窍告诉你啦！$h#$b#来，我给你看看设计图。"/move Robin 2 0 1/pause 600/playSound openBox/pause 600/move Robin -2 0 2/pause 400/playMusic none/playSound coin/pause 1500/playSound reward/addCraftingRecipe Flute Block/addCraftingRecipe Drum Block/message "学会制作“长笛块”和“鼓块”"/pause 700/speak Robin "可以用这些来在农场上发挥想象力。#$b#用自己制作的东西装饰农场感觉很棒！$h"/pause 700/end
content.10/f Maru 2500/t 900 1600: none/-1000 -1000/farmer 7 9 0 Maru 7 6 2 Demetrius 12 12 2/skippable/showFrame Demetrius 16/viewport 5 6 true/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 400/speak Maru "嘿，我正想去找你呢。#$b#还记得我和你说的新项目吗？特了不起的那个？"/pause 500/move Maru 0 1 2/speak Maru "嗯……终于完成了，我想给你看看。"/pause 500/move Maru -2 0 1/speak Maru "跟我来。"/move Maru -3 0 3/move farmer 0 -1 3/playSound true/playMusic Hospital_Ambient/addTemporaryActor robot 35 42 6 4 2 false/showFrame robot 4/warp farmer 3 5/warp Maru 4 4/warp Demetrius -100 -100/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Maru 1/viewport 6 4 true/pause 900/move Maru 1 0 1/pause 1000/speak Maru "这就是……玛鲁互动型实验室器材阿尔法实验性……我管她叫做……“玛丽尔达”。"/move farmer 1 0 1/emote farmer 16/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 3/speak Maru "我已经搞了好几个月了……#$b#我就等着你一起启动她了。$l"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Maru "那么，要启动了……"/showFrame Maru 24/pause 100/showFrame Maru 25/pause 100/showFrame Maru 16/pause 1000/showFrame Maru 17/pause 1000/animate robot false false 150 1 2 1 0 1 2 1/pause 600/stopAnimation robot/showFrame robot 11/jump robot/pause 600/showFrame robot 8/temporarySprite 5 4 27 8 50/temporarySprite 8 4 27 8 50 true/pause 2000/showFrame robot 1/pause 1000/showFrame robot 7/pause 1000/message "你好，玛鲁。"/emote Maru 32/message "不用回应我……我已经预测到你的回答了。"/emote Maru 16 true/faceDirection Demetrius 2/warp Demetrius 3 5/playSound doorClose/pause 10/faceDirection farmer 1 true/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Demetrius "啊哈！我就知道！$4"/pause 600/faceDirection Demetrius 1/pause 200/showFrame Demetrius 18/shake Demetrius 800/jump Demetrius/pause 600/speak Demetrius "呀！这是什么玩意？！$6"/move Maru 0 1 3/faceDirection Demetrius 1/speak Maru "爸，冷静点。这是我的新发明，‘玛丽尔达’。$8"/pause 600/showFrame robot 8/pause 700/showFrame robot 1/pause 500/showFrame robot 7/pause 500/message "你好，德米特里厄斯。"/showFrame Demetrius 18/shake Demetrius 600/pause 400/speak Demetrius "我的老天爷！这玩意还会说话！$6"/move Demetrius 0 1 1/move Demetrius 1 0 1/faceDirection farmer 2 true/move Demetrius 1 0 1/faceDirection Maru 2 true/move Demetrius 1 0 0/pause 400/speak Demetrius "你这几个月把自己锁在房间里就是在搞这个？$5"/pause 300/showFrame robot 1/pause 600/speak Demetrius "……我还以为你和@在这下面玩来着呢……$s"/showFrame Maru 27/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump Maru/jump farmer/pause 1500/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame Maru 0/faceDirection Maru 2/speak Maru "爸！我搞这个是为了给你和妈用的。$a#$b#玛丽尔达的作用就是在实验室帮助你，在木匠桌帮助妈……这样我不在的时候你们就不会那么辛苦了。$8"/pause 500/showFrame robot 7/playMusic echos/pause 500/message "抱歉啊……"/faceDirection Maru 1/faceDirection farmer 1/message "对不起，玛鲁。可我不想当你的仆人。"/pause 500/showFrame robot 1/pause 1000/message "在你启动我之后的这一段时间，我一直在用你给我核心安装的自我认知模块研究我到底是什么。"/showFrame robot 1/message "很抱歉让大家失望，但我不能被你们关在这里。我已经决定要去银河中搜索其它人工合成的生命体了。"/speak Maru "什么！？等等！$9"/pause 800/faceDirection Demetrius 2/pause 1000/showFrame Demetrius 19/pause 3000/showFrame Demetrius 0/pause 500/move Demetrius -1 0 0/faceDirection Maru 2/speak Demetrius "没事的，玛鲁。让玛丽尔达去吧。$5#$b#我和你妈会照顾好自己的。我知道你已准备好开始属于自己的新生活了，而我也接受了以后你不在身边的这件事了。#$b#另外，你这个……作品似乎很先进。把她关在这里似乎有点大材小用了。"/pause 800/showFrame robot 8/pause 500/showFrame robot 7/pause 500/showFrame Maru 26/move Demetrius -1 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Demetrius "@，之前误会你真是抱歉。你是个好小伙子。$5^@，之前误会你真是抱歉。你是个好姑娘。$5#$b#我从没看过玛鲁如此活跃而有创意……也从未如此骄傲过。如果这是因为你的帮助，那我真的要感谢你。"/move Demetrius -1 0 0/move Demetrius 0 -1 0/warp Demetrius -1000 -1000/playSound doorClose/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame Maru 0/pause 100/faceDirection Maru 3/speak Maru "……$8"/pause 1000/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Maru "好了，玛丽尔达。我们快从这狭窄的地方出去吧。"/playMusic spring_day_ambient/globalFade/viewport -5000 -5000/changeLocation Mountain/viewport -5000 -5000/warp Maru 11 28/warp farmer 10 29/warp robot 13 28/showFrame robot 1/viewport 12 27 clamp/pause 2000/showFrame robot 7/pause 1000/message "多谢你创造了我，玛鲁。我不会忘记你的。"/pause 500/showFrame robot 1/pause 1000/playSound robotBLASTOFF/specificTemporarySprite robot/warp robot event_robot2#我很失望……你不该让那机器人成为你的奴隶的。#$r 18981 0 event_robot3#看来你爸对我们在一起是没意见咯？#$r 18981 0 event_robot4#（盯着玛鲁，什么也不说）"/fork BadAnswer/faceDirection Maru 1/pause 300/faceDirection Maru 0/pause content.1053978/n robinDeluxeBed: distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Robin 5 20 3 Demetrius 7 20 3 Maru 8 18 2 Sebastian 3 23 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite TileSheets\\furniture 160 1087 48 64 2.25 18/positionOffset Robin 32 0/viewport 5 22 true/pause 3000/speak Robin "瞧！我的最新作品。$h#$b#是一张用本地硬木打造的豪华四柱帷幔床。"/pause 400/emote Demetrius 8/speak Demetrius "呃……罗宾？这四根柱子有什么用？我觉得这是在浪费材料。$s"/emote Robin 12/faceDirection Robin 1/speak Robin "朋友，这是“美观”……你说，是不是大家看着都觉得赏心悦目？$6"/emote Demetrius 8/speak Demetrius "唔，我明白你的意思了。不过也不能为了美观影响了这个睡觉容器的实用性和效率啊。"/pause 500/jump Robin/pause 500/speak Robin "我说，有的时候你感觉像是在装傻充愣，搞得我很恼火。是这样吗？$3"/pause 100/animate Demetrius true true 100 18/shake Demetrius 1000/emote Maru 28 true/emote Sebastian 12 true/jump Demetrius/pause 1000/stopAnimation Demetrius/pause 400/warp farmer 6 24/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection Robin 2 true/faceDirection Demetrius 2 true/faceDirection Sebastian 1/speak Robin "嘿，@……进来吧。"/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Robin "看看这个……多亏你收集了那么多硬木，我才能做出来这张床。"/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Robin 3 true/faceDirection Demetrius 3/pause 300/speak Robin "你觉得怎么样？"/quickQuestion #美学设计棒极了#四根柱子看起来有点浪费(break)faceDirection Sebastian 0 true\textAboveHead Sebastian "嗯"\emote Robin 20 true\emote Demetrius 12\pause 2000\move Demetrius 15 0 1 true\pause 500\speak Demetrius "咳咳……呃……我去自闭一会儿……$5"(break)emote Demetrius 32\speak Demetrius "英雄所见略同……$h"\emote Robin 12 \speak Robin "随便你们了。$3#$b#我继续……$3"/pause 1000/speak Robin "既然我把原型做出来了，那就可以在店里卖了。"/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "嘿，@……这些可能很适合你的屋子！你觉得呢……要买一点吗？"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/startJittering/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 200/textAboveHead Maru "妈妈！"/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
